body: Possibly the only Fate doujin where Rin didn't get raped and Shirou didn't get cucked. True Enlightenment
@Seasonic SSR-550FX Thank you for supporting the artist! She just finished working on the sequel to this doujin, so I hope you check it out when the translation is complete.

@Anon202096 Paying for digital content that can be had gratis (however dubiously) sure feels like a ritual lol. Took me four months to find a spare minute or two to drop some money on my spare debit (main would get rejected) and use that for the purchase. Looks like there are no gifting options though, sad... Anyway I can now be a functioning member of the Nhentai society again! :D No regrets, no shame, no feeling of defeat
yay, a doujin where rin is not raped, 10/10

best girl 10/10
@Seasonic SSR-550FX Purchasing from 2d Market would be a very nice way to support the artist, yes :)
@xOnlyFadi I'm honestly not sure? I could try and ask because that would be really dope if possible.

@Anon202096 if I grab a digital copy on 2dmarket is that supportive? Fakku has many ppl's attitude towards them right in their name, considering their ironic history. Not keen on using *that* platform. Also thx a ton for showing up! That's rare and appreciated
@Anon202096 can't fakku print an uncensored copy and sell it just like irodoricomics did?

@reddragon88 Unfortunately no. She has sold her stuff internationally before, but that's usually when it gets reprinted. If there's enough demand for it I'm sure she would like to. But I'm not too sure on the specifics. The cost of shipping might be too high, and there's zero chance the uncensored version would be printed and sold internationally as that would be against Japanese law.
Blessed. Worthy of all the support possible.
@Anon202096 is it possible to buy a hard copy of the doujin with international shipping?

Hello! I am the English native who helped the author localize this wonderful doujinshi. I'm not commenting here to speak on the author's behalf or to try and guilt trip anybody for not purchasing the official work, but please support her directly if you do enjoy it. You can do so by purchasing it (it's roughly $5), but you can also simply give her a follow, like, etc. since a metric ton of work was put into this (especially so by her as all the SFX were written by hand). I'm honestly ecstatic that there are a lot of people really enjoying the work, but, with all due respect, please don't just settle with liking the work here on a third party website. I'm not saying you need to go out and buy it officially, but please at least show her some love! Especially if you're interested in seeing more wholesome Shirou and Rin stuff like this from her in the future. We both hope you continue to enjoy it :)
Her twitter: https://twitter.com/snowrich114
Pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/15209843
Now in digital!!! A great pog day.
